price: 21. Мре bakoloba na baloposo na bango ete: Mpona nini bozali kolobela mabe na biso? Baloposo bikozongisa eyano ete: Allah oyo alobisaka biloko binso ye nde alobisi biso. Мре ye nde akelaki bino mpona mbala ya liboso mpe epai naye nde bokozongisama.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لِجُلُودِهِمۡ لِمَ شَهِدتُّمۡ عَلَيۡنَاۖ قَالُوٓاْ أَنطَقَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنطَقَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
